channel.title: Object = Tele on click if next to it
channel.description:
Ok.
I have my server with my places and all.
But theres a crevice. Now...
When you click the crevice i want it to tell you to ####,####, but ONLY if you're next to it (So if you clicked it from miles away, you'd need to get closer).
How do I do this :O

item.title: Object = Tele on click if next to it
item.dc:creator: @krixus krixus
item.description:
@krixus wrote:

So what would i put in as the case?

I’m a newbie at Java. I’m trying to learn by getting codes, understanding them, editing them and adding them.

Read full topic
item.source: Object = Tele on click if next to it

item.title: Object = Tele on click if next to it
item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!
item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

Well…you could have 1 object, and this would work.

case #: if(absX >= # && absX <= # && absY >= # && absY <= #) { teleportToX = #; teleportToY = #; break;

Just a hint:
Make a box around the SINGLE object with the abs’s.
There’s another way for multiple objects, including || with abs’s.

Read full topic
item.source: Object = Tele on click if next to it
